phrases: (Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
(Get ready, dig your anger up, MOB!)
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
Coming down, could you fill your satisfaction?
Cannot you feel your own frustration?
Coming down, could you fill your satisfaction?
What do you want to be?
Wear your overflowing emotions on your sleeve and break it down.
What do you see once you go beyond your limits?
Cryin' my life, cryin' my psyche,
cryin' my heart in such commonplaces!
It all begins when it hits 100.
The MOB is staying frustrated, are not you?
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
(Get ready, dig your anger up, MOB!)
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
Now I will be able to hit you with everything...
You are enjoying this too, are not you?
What the hell is going on?
They are fighting in a whole different stratosphere!
As righteous as you try to sound, deep down, you are the same as me.
How does it feel to be released from your shackles?
We are freer than anyone else!
How could I be so foolish?
It may have only been for a moment, but I let this power control me!
At this rate, you will never catch up to me, no matter how far you go.
I am the best in the world!
How did your life end up being so hollow?
I cannot judge you for the life you chose, though.
There is no one in this world that is as lucky as me!
Heaven bestowed these powers upon me
and made you all extras, created solely to make my star shine!
Then it was not luck that you were lacking.
You were the only one who existed in your world.
Living in a world where I am completely alone, one I want to forget forever.
but I really do not want to hurt you.
What the hell is going on?
Does that mean it is over?
He is just a normal middle school kid.
You used a tremendous amount of power again.
My dad's aura did not disappear.
My dad mentioned before that he picked up the habit of only awakening
when put under a lot of stress.
How can one man's powers be so immense?
This is the one day in your life you should not try to do the impossible.
He is already using way more power than he did when beat me.
You are not responsible for any of this,
I have never felt like this before.
Do not think I am going to let you say you are done already.
As much as I hate to admit it,
I do not have the power to show you a new path.
You awakened my destructive impulses, now you have to deal with them!
Do not go hiding in your she will now!
I hoped that you could turn over a new leaf and become a better person,
I-It appears... that we are both...
influencing each other quite a bit...
But I could not be a good influence.
We can both lose at this point.
Nothing compared to the fear of losing all I have.
If something like that makes it outside...
He ended up releasing too much energy and self-destructed!
All that is left is an excessive amount of energy.
I am pretty sure an explosion will happen,
So you are saying we will not be able to contain it.
We are going to get caught up in that if we stay here.
That is the president's final light...
Our president who was trying to take over the world...
There is no way to avoid this.
Your only choice is to end my life to sever the energy source
I am going to contain the explosion.
In the end, you are not able to defeat me,
save your friends, or save yourself.
With your powers, you should have been able to handle this better.
Just having powers does not mean everything works out for you.
as long as you make the important choices yourself.
I am the protagonist of my own life.
That is why I chose to be here.
No matter how much I dislike you, to leave you to suffer on your own
So I am going to help you.
What do you plan to do with that filthy cat?
Well, the poor thing was drenched and shivering in the rain.
Sho will grow up into a gentle boy.
He is going to grow up watching you, after all.
Why did you have to be so violent?!
To lead an organization, I need to establish my dominance.
You cannot move people's hearts with psychic powers!
As long as I have this power, people will follow me.
You think that is true for everyone?
Sho is also showing interest in my powers as well.
You wanted to apologize, did not you?!
Then you need to do it say it loud and clear!
I also have someone I need to express my feelings to!
Anyway, we should get away from here.
All of our wounds have been healed.
Our clothes are in shambles, though.
Shigeo, what is up with the left side of your chest?
That is quite the bold fashion statement.
I do consider you my rival, you know?
Do not wander off too far.
Watch out for things that may fall onto your head.
Surprisingly, there are not any news helicopters flying around.
They are too scared to come here when they know so little.
Everything seems fine, even after that giant explosion.
I seriously thought you were a goner back there.
I was sure ground zero would have been eviscerated.
But what appeared there happened to be...
Are you still actually hurt somewhere?
But lately, whenever I use a lot of power,
I have a hard time staying awake afterward.
Sorry, he will fix up your house, but he will need three days.
You guys want to come to my place?
It will be a bit cramped, but I am sure we can make it work.
At least try to hide your displeasure, jeez.
Oh, do not worry about me.
Could we stop by the school first?
There should be a spare tracksuit in his club room.
I wonder if I could borrow one for myself.
But I cannot do it without asking...
I came here to get some dumbbells, and you sure gave me a scare.
You scared us pretty good, too.
Why is everyone from the Body Improvement Club here?
will now begin a three-day four-night strengthening hell training camp!
We should always help each other out when in need!
I mean, we are really tired
I am sure you want to sleep on a giant futon!
No, a small one will do just fine!
We have enough room for all of you at my granny's house!
You have to procure and make your own food, so it will be excellent training!
And it is just a 90-minute jog away!
We will be there in no time!
I am going to take a cab home.
I should have just gone over to Reigen-san's place.
I wonder what that thing is.
It is even more confusing up close.
How do one of these things even grow?
This is the work of aliens!
The work of our beloved leader?
You are the ones behind that giant plant?
If you are asking if we were directly involved, then no.
I think I am going to stop coming here.
If everything goes well with your research
and you actually develop the technology to make espers out of people,
we might get more espers who misuse their powers.
So I think you should just stop.
I do not even need the money.
We are actually not that impressive.
I will stop using you for research!
But to be honest, I am just having fun
You do not mind coming by once in a while as friends, do you?
What are you going to do now?
I am obviously going to have to find another way to live.
Now that the scars on my face are gone, maybe I will start up a ramen shop.
The hospitality industry is not for you.
Just put your body to good use.
What are you going to do, Sakurai?
I have an interview at a convenience store the day after tomorrow.
You are going to ask him?
I am considering asking Master Reigen if I can study under him for a while.
You are really not a people person.
this is the work of a delusional criminal organization, huh?
I cannot believe you turned yourself in after being defeated by a civilian esper.
Man, where does that leave us pros?
What is going to happen to my dad?
Under normal circumstances, he would be executed.
But there is a chance he will be kept alive as a research subject.
Why did he have to say that to his son?
Well, it is not my call to make,
so I cannot say for sure.
I never actually considered you all my comrades.
There is no reason to be worried about me.
Because you lack self-confidence, others will find you easy to manipulate.
I wanted you to see your mother again,
but my pride severed that possibility.
I see Mom every now and then.
She is always asking me how you are doing.
I wish I could have stopped you before she found out what you would become.
When I called her this morning, she said she would come see you sometime.
So do not you dare think this is all over.
You still need to get an earful from Mom.
It was just a short circuit?
Apparently, a mouse bit into some wires.
Thanks to that, the fire insurance kicked in,
so we get a fresh start at a new office.
But it sure looks bland right now.
I would put the broccoli seeds in there.
Let us just forget we ever saw this.
But man, he sure is late...
Thanks for the other day, Kageyama-kun.
You are going to work here?
Reigen-san made me an offer after all that.
He said that there was something that even I could do.
And it is the least I can do after my organization caused everyone trouble.
We are here to make a better tomorrow, so this is perfect for you!
My client will be here soon, but before that...
We are going to have to do something about that.
I guess he at least looks like he can pull off customer service now.
Wh-What should I do when a customer shows up?!
What did you do at your last job?
My orders were to smack them with my umbrella if I sensed any hostility...
Yeah, things are not that different here.
If there is anything else you do not understand,
go ahead and ask your senior there.
Mob, you show him the ropes while he is still in training.
It is a pleasure to work with you, Kageyama-senpai!
It is... a pleasure to work with you, too...
Now I am getting nervous, too.
Please have a seat right over there.
Serizawa, get our guest some tea.
I-I am sorry, I have never made tea before...
